name: The Square (PowerofGames)
description:
Hey, do you like parkour? This is your best challenge

Our game challenges you to finish it if you can. Enjoy parkour in different areas in a strange and strange world. The beta will be released soon. Get ready. We will not let you down if you support us.

10 levels of varying difficulty, try it now 

operating requirements pc:

1-1.5 GB RAM 

Pentium 4 processor with a frequency of 3 GHz 

Intel GMA 900 graphics card or higher
